page.title: 06Homelessness(2)
page.content:
The standard of our housing has a great effect on our health.The effects of insecure and badly maintained housing, overcrowding and lack of amenities are apparent to all who experience them. But if you are homeless or live in a hostel,it is almost impossible to get the health care you need.GPs may refuse to have you as a patient and hospitals may not treat patients who would norm- ally see a GP.Treatment may not be effective if you have to return to the same conditions that caused the illness Sometimes people may even be afraid of you because of your appearance or they might be suspicious of you because you are unkempt and dirty.
Sharon Burke(11)
